faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and services

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial on all plans. No credit card is required to start. You'll get full access to all features during the trial period.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure payment processor, Stripe. For enterprise plans, we also accept bank transfers.

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: We bill monthly with a one-time setup fee. You'll be billed on the same date each month. All charges will appear as 'Entagl' on your statement. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time, and we'll prorate the charges accordingly.

channels.question: What are additional channels?
channels.answer: Additional channels are social media platforms beyond your first one. For example, if you start with Instagram, adding Facebook would be an additional channel.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. Setup fees become non-refundable after service activation. Refunds are processed back to the original payment method within 5-10 business days.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through your account dashboard or by contacting support. You'll retain access to all features until the end of your current billing period. We don't offer refunds for partial months, but you won't be charged again after cancellation.

dispute.question: What if I have a billing dispute?
dispute.answer: For any billing concerns, please contact our billing team at info@entagl.com or call +16476863366. We aim to resolve all disputes within 48 hours. If needed, you can also submit a formal dispute through your payment provider.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: We provide comprehensive support through multiple channels: 24/7 email support (info@entagl.com), live chat, and phone support (+16476863366) during business hours. Premium plans include priority support with 2-hour response times and a dedicated account manager.
